mapper.select: SELECT O.*, OD.ORDER_DETAIL_NUM, OD.ORDER_NUM order_detail_num, OD.ORDER_FOOD_NUM, OD.FOOD_NUM, OD.SUM_PRICE,OD.PICKUP_DATE, MOVIE.MOVIE_NUM movie_num, MOVIE.MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE.MOVIE_NAME, MOVIE.MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MOVIE.MOVIE_OPENDATE, MOVIE.MOVIE_AGERANGE, MOVIE.MOVIE_COUNTRY, MOVIE.MOVIE_PRICE, MOVIE.MOVIE_INFO FROM ORDERS O LEFT JOIN order_detail OD ON(O.ORDER_NUM = OD.ORDER_NUM) JOIN MOVIE ON (O.MOVIE_NUM = MOVIE.MOVIE_NUM) WHERE O.CUST_NUM = #{custNum} AND O.MOVIE_NUM = #{movieNum}
